name: Cube Rush (WS-Games)
description:
Cube Rush is a fast-paced 2D shooter game where you control a cube.
Fight enemies with four unique weapons and gain the highest score possible!

If you want your score to appear on the leaderboard,
play this game on GameJolt here!

How to play

This is a singleplayer game. The controls are:

  • A/D to move horizontally
  • W to jump
  • R to reload
  • Mouse to aim, left click to shoot
  • Escape to pause
Support this project

If you like this game please follow me to get notified when an update comes out!
If you want to support this project even more you can always donate :)
The music is made by Raphytator. Listen to his other music here!
